item.title: Achievement Unlocked: Geek Dad Cred
item.description: I took the kids to Captain America: The Winter Soldier this past Sunday. You know itâ€™s going to be a blockbuster when the theater is 75% filled at a 9:30 a.m. showing on a Sunday morning. I usually like to take the kids to the early showing as the theater is almost empty on Sunday mornings. Warning: Minor Spoiler Two thirds of the way through the movie, Natasha Romanova (Black Widow), played by Scarlett Johansson, and Steve Rogers (Captain America), played by Chris Evans, enter an abandoned military base with an ancient mainframe computer system.
